gobblin.runtime.instance

Class StandardGobblinInstanceDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.instance.DefaultGobblinInstanceDriverImpl
        • gobblin.runtime.instance.StandardGobblinInstanceDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, Instrumentable, GobblinInstanceDriver, GobblinInstanceEnvironment, JobLifecycleListenersContainer

    public class StandardGobblinInstanceDriver
extends DefaultGobblinInstanceDriverImpl
    A simple wrapper DefaultGobblinInstanceDriverImpl that will instantiate necessary sub-components (e.g. JobCatalog, JobSpecScheduler, JobExecutionLauncher and it will manage their lifecycle.

    • Nested Class Summary
